description:
Now an official superhero, Subaru is eager to make his mark. Feeling desperate, he starts to get ahead of himself.
Source: netflix

titles.title: No One Knows the Weight of Another`s Burden.
No one knows the weight of another`s burden. 他人の荷物の重さは, 誰にも分からない
Tanin no Nimotsu no Omosa wa, Dare ni mo Wakaranai
Никогда не угадаешь, что пережил другой человек
